head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SCHOEMER, JOHN R., JR.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SCHOEMER, JOHN R., JR.

block.p: SCHOEMER-John R., Jr. Sept. 20, 2000, of Somers, NY, formerly of Briarcliff Manor, NY. Partner in the former law firm of Townley Updike. Husband of Dorothy (nee Goett). Father of John, Jill Hunter and Carolyn Huyghe. Also survived by 7 grandchildren and five great-grandchildren. Reposing at Clark Associates Funeral Home, Katonah, New York, Friday, 2-4 and 7-9 PM. Funeral Mass at St. Joseph's R.C. Church, Croton Falls, NY, Saturday, 10 AM. Interment Gate of Heaven Cemetery.
